title: The ile of gulls As it hath been often acted in the Black Fryers, by the Children of the Revels.
author: Day, John, 1574-1640?
publisher: Printed [by Augustine Mathewes] for William Sheares, at the Harrow in Britaines Bursse,
notes: The plot is taken from: Sidney, Sir Philip.  Arcadia.
